title: Audacious New Year Goals? 5 Tips to Help You Track and Unpack Your Cycling Training Data
content:
USA Cycling's legendary trainer Jim Miller shares simple ways self-coached athletes can decode their data and fast-forward their fitness in the new year.

Read the full article at Audacious New Year Goals? 5 Tips to Help You Track and Unpack Your Cycling Training Data on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
